Tupperpot

Cafe

View Menu

821 Bridgeport Ave ,
New York, NY

Gather your loved ones for food and quality time at our cozy Junction restaurant that serves wholesome plant-based asian fusion dishes. Grasshopper Eatery is open for lunch and dinner or anything in between.

Appetizers

Rice Popper 8

Have yourself an arancini ball — with red rice, chili vegetables and irresistible dipping sauce.


Popcorn Nuggets 8

Cornflake-coated crispy pieces of seasoned non-GMO soy, ancient grains and veggies, served with gochujang mayo, wasabi mayo or mild BBQ sauce. (This is dunk food.)


Hiyayako GF 7

Chilled tofu topped with green onions, grated ginger and season with a little bit of soy sauce and Japanese hot sauce.


Spicy Shishito Pepper GF 8

The Dr Pepper is in: Grilled shishito peppers with Japanese hot sauce.


Avo Dip & Crispy Tortilla 7

Hip chip and dip: Edamame and avocado mixed with your choice of flavor vegannaise or wasabi mayo, served with crispy tortilla.


 

Sides

Soup of the Day SM 5 | LG 8

Classic Fries 5

Sesame Fries 10

Classic fries topped with sesame seeds, sesame oil and green onion.


Cheese Fries GF 8

Classic fries topped with chipotle 'cheese' sauce, vegan parm and green onions.


Kimchi Fries GF 10

Poutine with a spicy Korean upgrade: Fries topped with kimchi, red daikon radish, roasted sesame seeds and our irresistible house sauce.


Japanese Curry Fries 10

Curry up and get in my belly! Fries topped with Japanese curry sauce, chipotle 'cheddar', cashew 'parmesan' and chives.

 

Deserts

Daily Cheese Cake GF 8

A biscuit base topped with the smooth, rich, non-dairy filling of the day.


Tiramisu GF 7

Our signature dessert! Vegan mascarpone with espresso and gluten-free ladyfingers..


 

Brunch

Okonomi-Yaki 13

This savoury Japanese pancake is as authentic* as it is addictive: Stuffed with cabbage, green onion, and topped with pickled ginger, house-made veganaise and salty-sweet okonomi sauce, it’s served up in a traditional skillet. (*The dish hails from Osaka, which is also Chef Haru’s home city.)


Japanese Pancake NUT 13

Meet the fluffiest vegan pancakes you have ever tasted. Toppings vary every weekend.


Better Benny NUT 16

Ripe avocado and vegan cashew-based “hollandaise” sit atop fluffy Japanese mini-pancakes topped with spinach, sautéed mushrooms and hand-pulled “pork,” accompanied by a fresh side salad of mizuna greens and carrots, as well as crisp roast potatoes. (Game changer.)


Chick-Un and Waffles NUT 15

Crispy Chick-Un glazed with sweet Buffalo sauce, served on a house-made basil-and-oregano waffle.

 

Plates

Burgers and wraps come with your choice of soup, sald or fries. Upgrade GF buns for $3.
Teriyaki Chick-Un Burger NUT 15

Our spin on a classic: Teriyaki Chick-Uun burger topped with pickles, tomato, lettuce, and a creamy cashew sauce on a whole-wheat bun..


Spicy Lentil Burger 16

A lentil coup: A homemade spicy lentil patty, roasted lotus root and avocado, served on a whole-wheat bun. Can be upgraded to GF.


Pulled Pork Burger 14

Vegan 'pulled pork' dressed in a smoky and tangy BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw and served on a wholewheat bun.


Crispy Chick-Un Wrap NUT 15

Pieces of crispy Popcorn Chick-Un with lettuce, tomato, pickles, kinpira, house-made vegannaise and our fan-fave popper sauce, served in a wholewheat tortilla. Like chick flicks, this is a guilty pleasure you feel good after.


Curry Burrito 16

Genmai rice, Japanese curry sauce, smokey tofu, baby spinach and pico de gallo are topped in our chipotle 'cheese' sauce and wrapped in a wholewheat tortilla.


Breakfast Wrap 15

Rainbow of healthy veggies including roasted sweet potato, avocado, tofu scramble and tomatoes, all drizzled with aioli and wrapped in a wholewheat tortilla.


Upgrade Your Side

Power Kale Salad 3
Sesame Fries 2
“Cheese” fries 3
Kimchi fries 3
Curry fries 3

 

Bowls

All burgers and wraps are served with your choice of soup, salad or fries.


Power Kale'N Cabbage GF 14

Our spin on a classic: Teriyaki Chick-Uun burger topped with pickles, tomato, lettuce, and a creamy cashew sauce on a whole-wheat bun.


Quinoa Harvest GF NUT 15

We're just a little beet crazy about this one! Our house-made smoked beet, lentil and brown rice patty comes topped with lettuce, avocado, pico de gallo and babecue sauce and is served on a wholewheat bun. It's a burger that dances to its own beet. Make it all gluten free by upgrading to a gluten-free bun ($3).


Japanese Curry 15

Vegan pull-the-other-one “pork” dressed in a spicy and tangy BBQ sauce, served with cabbage, carrots, lettuce and coleslaw, on a whole-wheat bun.


Me So (Miso) Happy GF 14

Pieces of crispy Popcorn Chick-Un with lettuce, tomato, pickles, kinpira, veganaise and our fan-fave house hot sauce, served in a whole-wheat tortilla. Like chick flicks, this is a guilty pleasure you feel good after.


Breakfast Bowl GF 14

Genmai rice, Japanese curry sauce, smokey tofu, baby spinach and pico de gallo are topped in our chipotle 'cheese' sauce and wrapped in a wholewheat tortilla.

The items and prices of our menus are subject to change without notice and are displayed for informational purposes only. If you have serious allergies please give us a call before your visit so we can ensure you have an amazing experience.
